message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget concerns, but $60 is significantly less than what I'm looking for. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $75? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my budget.
